name: Boonk Gang Run
description:
Boonk Gang Run is theGame of South Florida resident John Robert Hill, who performing stunts and committing various crimes.
Run boonk gang

Boonk Gang Run!!! is a simple and addictive adventurous run game with simple controls. Our Criminal and its youtubers are starving in the various crimes, help the little boonk gang to run and to be free from the police. Just click the screen to make boonkto jump all obstacles. This boonk gang run is the best crimes and adventure game. It has the best fun run game with good graphics and music.

***Features***

1. Tap the screen to make boonk run.

2. Collect all the moneys without being caught by polices.

3. Run and finish all the levels.

4. Have good relaxing music and sound effects.


***How to play***

1. Just tap the screen to jump the boonk.

2. Collect moneys as many as you can, without being caught by farmer

3. Run to the end of the levels to reach home to celebrate moneys.
